p: From the above experimental data, it appears that the 90% extracts were efficient. In this case also, the fungi grow until the third day and then their growth stops, while in the control sample the growth is limited by the petri dish and stops. Potato Dextrose Agar (PDA) provides a nutrient base for luxuriant growth of most fungi [ 41]. In 50% plant extracts, they have a moderate effect whereas in the 25%, plant extracts have similar effect.
